content: **find the free version of this pattern here 1 ** camp kerchief - ready for a campfire under the starry night sky the camp kerchief is a sister pattern to my scout kerchief design featuring the same gorgeous texture but with longer tails and a gorgeous dk weight yarn if you d like a smaller version of this kerchief that uses fingering weight yarn check out the scout kerchief pattern the camp kerchief is small and light but so soft and cozy it s like a mini triangle scarf or shawl which are two of my favorite projects to make it s perfect for daytime nature walks and those cozy nights next to the fire under the starry sky visit www woodsandwool com for the free version of this pattern pattern + download - please note this listing is for a pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes a stitch diagram to aid written instructions - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level - crochet pattern - this pattern is ideal for an advanced beginner it is beginner-friendly but does require some knowledge of basic stitches and pattern reading yarn - this pattern uses about 320 yards of dk weight yarn a light worsted weight yarn would also work great for this pattern copyright the camp kerchief pattern and photographs are property of woods and wool and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are more than welcome to sell the finished product please credit woods and wool by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online share your work follow along on instagram at @woodsandwool tag @woodsandwool and use the #campkerchief hashtag to show off your beautiful new kerchief 1 https //www woodsandwool com/free-crochet-pattern-camp-kerchief/
